name: Loop it (Yheeky Games)
description:
A Ludum Dare 47 game (theme was "Stuck in a loop") created in 72h (Jam).

You have 30 seconds to perform actions that your past self repeats in the new run. Solve the space puzzle by collecting the three gems and go through the Gate of Freedom.

Controls
  • WASD - move around
  • T- Skip 10 seconds of time
  • L - Activate the lasergun (when collected)
  • B - Activate the bomb (when collected)
  • SPACE - Use activated item
  • Arrow keys - Aim with lasergun
Creators
  • Djamschid Arefi
  • Tobias König
  • Felix Manthe
  • Christian Ruppert

Enjoy!
